item.description: Come out and see Big Shot –A Billy Joel Tribute band on the North Haven Green. Enjoy a night out under the stars, bring a snack and drinks. Don't forget to bring a blanket or chair. Parking is available behind town hall, at the rec center and in church lots around the green. I will be there by 6:30 the concert starts at 7:00.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for yellow and purple balloons near the gazebo

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Big Shot – Billy Joel Tribute on the North Haven Green
